trans-unit.source: Runs a set of child activities according to a single defined ordering.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> can contain other activities.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> class coordinates the running of a set of child activities in an ordered manner, one at a time.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> is completed when the final child activity is finished.

Classes that derive from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> should not implement the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener%601> interface, or the derived class will not execute correctly.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
The user-defined name of the activity.
Cancels the execution of the activity.
The execution context of the activity.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> of the activity after canceling the execution.
Executes the activity.
The execution context of the activity.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> of the activity after executing the activity.
Called when an exception is raised within the context of the execution of this instance.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this instance.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> which caused this fault.
The execution status of the activity.
Called when an activity is removed.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this instance.
The specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, determines the action taken by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity"></xref> when the activity has completed execution.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this instance.
executionContext is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
Called after changes have been made to the collection <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities"></xref> of this instance.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this instance.
Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
The object that raised the event.
The previously typed event arguments.
